synopsis.text:
Rem and Ram, along with Subaru, have finally defeated the Demon Beast Wolgarm, bringing peace to the village of Irlam. As everyone enjoys a well-deserved break, Subaru secretly embarks on a mission to find the perfect spot for a date with his beloved Emilia. Despite donning a disguise, the children of the village quickly recognize him and offer their help. They lead him to a beautiful meadow filled with flowers, which Subaru deems perfect for his romantic rendezvous.

However, as the day of the date approaches, an unseasonal chill descends upon Roswaal's mansion, and Emilia's behavior becomes increasingly peculiar. With the cold becoming unbearable, Subaru is forced to postpone his date. As he investigates the source of the sudden winter, Subaru realizes that his date may be the least of his worries. Will he be able to uncover the truth and save the day, or will his eagerly awaited date with Emilia be doomed to fail? Only time will tell in this exciting new OVA for Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu.
